name: Keepers of the Krypt
overview: A rare game rescued from the oblivion for the pleasure of the C64 games collectors. The original version was from 1983 by pli micro, updated with docs and fixes and re-released on December 4, 2022 by Hokuto Force. A game of the 10 different levels of the labyrinth. You can choose male or female protagonist. Created by Christina and Mike Levine.
